txt.en: This rigging-hook was used by a freebooter named Dírharn, who gave up a life of piracy and sought a new beginning. He cast aside his rigging-hook, but it was found and taken into Mordor. It has now been cleansed of the evil that corrupted it, and Elrond has imbued it with the Light of Eärendil. He believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
